column1: White Lady is an epithet that can refer to:

column2: Elven princess and daughter of King Turgon
column3: known as "the White Lady of Gondolin" or "the White Lady of the Noldor";

column2: niece of King Théoden and slayer of the Witch-king
column3: known as the "White Lady of Rohan";

column2: Lady of Lothlórien and bearer of Nenya
column3: referred to as the "White Lady" by Faramir.
